long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Reload a displayed tab at interval that you input.
The reload feature works while a popup opens.

This extension will be helpful especially when you want to access a website that many people also try to access.

How to use:
1. Input interval seconds that you want to reload automatically.
2. Click start button to start automatic reload.
3. The tab that you open is reloaded automatically.
4. Click stop button if you want to stop automatic reload.
